title: Strategies for Enhancing Educational Quality Awareness and Student Satisfaction for Science Teachers

context.additional_context: Strengthening survey design and analysis competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can design a science-subject-specific educational quality perception assessment tool (survey).
Learners can explain methods for analyzing the correlation between student satisfaction data and educational quality evaluation results.
Learners can interpret the impact of demographic factors (gender, major, learning duration) on assessment outcomes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
